title: Why do I still get blocked people in my games?
body:
rito plz why do i still get blocked people in my games. i wouldnt mind at all if they were all on the other team but i have seen them on my team numerous times.
i blocked them for a reason. i can understand, sort of, that the reporting and punishing shit might not be that effective in oce because you dont care about us, but give us something to work with, theres still a lot more people i can be playing against without sacrificing more than 5 minutes of queue time
of course again, the easiest solution would be to just chuck all the blocked cunts on the other team for me to verse and rito will see how toxic they can get

replies.body: Why do people think that if they block someone they won't get them in a game... blocking only stops them from contacting you and hides their messages from you.
because blocking people doesn't mean you don't play with them. It means you just don't get to see what they type.
